label: packageType
comment: A package type, expressed as text, for this supply chain consignment item.
A type of package, expressed as text, for this supply chain consignment.
A type, expressed as text, of this logistics package.
A type, expressed as text, of this referenced logistics package.

domainIncludes.comment: A separately identifiable collection of goods items to be transported or available to be transported from one consignor to one consignee via one or more modes of transport where each consignment is the subject of one single transport contract.
An item within a consignment of goods separately identified for transport and customs purposes.
Any self-contained wrapping or container within which goods can be contained, such as a box or a barrel which can be filled, partially filled or empty.
